0.1.1 (2025-03-03)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- First release
- Add the following public APIs:
    - ``docpack.api.find_matching_files``
    - ``docpack.api.GitHubFile``
    - ``docpack.api.GitHubPipeline``
    - ``docpack.api.ConfluencePage``
    - ``docpack.api.ConfluencePipeline``
